text: Japan Society for Simulation Technology (JSST) is a Japanese counterpart of the International Association for Mathematics and Computers in Simulation. JSST aims to promote studies about simulation technology such as numerical analysis, validated numerics, and artificial intelligence. In order to achieve this goal, JSST is publishing the Journal of Advanced Simulation in Science and Engineering in English. ==Related pages== * Japan Society for the Promotion of Science * Japan Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics Category:Mathematical societies Category:Technology organizations Category:1981 establishments in Japan Category:Scientific organizations based in Japan
title: Japan Society for Simulation Technology
